import React from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { createStructuredSelector } from 'reselect' import { selectCartItems, selectCartTotal } from '../../redux/cart/cart.selectors' import { toggleCartHidden } from '../../redux/cart/cart.actions' import './Checkout.scss' const CheckoutPage = ({ cartItems, total }) => (
Product
Description
Quantity
Price
Remove
{ cartItems.map(item => item.name) }
Total: ${total}
) const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector({ cartItems: selectCartItems, total: selectCartTotal }) export default connect(mapStateToProps, null)(CheckoutPage);
